CAST YOUR VOTE ONLINE

Cast your vote with any device with access to the internet from anywhere

Vote online in 5 steps

  • Ensure you read instructions before voting otherwise your vote will be void
  • Locate the positions you want to vote below
  • Choose your candidate
  • Enter your Matric Number in the name space provided
  • Click on the vote button
